# Images for README

This directory contains images used in the main README.md file.

## Usage

Images stored here are accessible via:
```
https://raw.githubusercontent.com/rhesis-ai/rhesis/main/.github/images/{filename}
```

## Current Images

Add your images here and they will be available for use in the README and other documentation.

### Example Usage in Markdown

```markdown
![Alt Text](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/rhesis-ai/rhesis/main/.github/images/your-image.png)
```

Or using relative path (works in GitHub and can be previewed locally):
```markdown
![Alt Text](.github/images/your-image.png)
```
